citation: Statement of Principles concerning lumbar spondylosis No. 62 of 2014

aggravationFactors.text: inability to obtain appropriate clinical management for lumbar spondylosis
having inflammatory joint disease in the lumbar spine before the clinical worsening of lumbar spondylosis

definedTerms.definition: means rheumatoid arthritis, reactive arthritis, sporiatic arthropathy, ankylosing spondylitis, or arthritis associated with Crohn's disease or ulcerative colitis
